Description: Marek argue with his father H.G. Tannhaus because he doesn't pay him enough attention.
Marek, Sonja and their daugther Charlotte leave tannhaus shop and take the car although it's raining.

ID: Marek Tannhaus, Sonja Tannhaus, Charlotte Tannhaus

Description: Marek, Sonja and little charlotte die in a car accident.

ID: Marek Tannhaus, Sonja Tannhaus, Charlotte Tannhaus

Description: Adult H.G. Tannhaus remembers his family.
He wants to create a time machine to undo it all.
He spends the next years building a time machine in the bunker.
Old H.G. Tannhaus finishes his machine...
Instead of saving his family, he splits and destroys his world, thus creating both Adam and Eve worlds.
Jonas and Martha arrive in the origin world.

ID: H.G. Tannhaus, Marek Tannhaus, Sonja Tannhaus, Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M), Charlotte Tannhaus

Description: Jonas and Martha persuade Marek not to drive over the bridge where the fatal accident would have occurred.

ID: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M), Marek Tannhaus, Sonja Tannhaus, Charlotte Tannhaus

Description: Marek and his family return to Tannhaus' house. They live so H.G. Tannhaus never builds the time machine.

ID: H.G. Tannhaus, Marek Tannhaus, Sonja Tannhaus, Charlotte Tannhaus

Description: H.G. Tannhaus world remains, but Adam and Eve's worlds  - and all of their inhabitants - cease to exist.
Jonas and Martha hold hands as they watch each other disappear.

ID: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
